answers.answer: The PTSD Help app is designed as a free assistant for managing Post Traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD).
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/ptsd-help and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: The app assists by providing a variety of resources and tools specifically designed to support people with PTSD.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/ptsd-help and read the section under 'What does PTSD Help do?'.

answers.answer: The app offers essential information about PTSD, a self-assessment module, practical tools for managing discomfort, crisis support contacts, and detailed information about professional treatments.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/ptsd-help and read the section under 'What does PTSD Help do?'.

answers.answer: The PTSD Help app was developed in partnership with the US Department of Veterans Affairs - National Center for PTSD.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/ptsd-help and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: The PTSD Help app is available for Android and iOS operating systems.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/ptsd-help and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: The app is primarily intended for vulnerable people affected by the crisis in Ukraine and individuals affected by any type of traumatic experience such as war, violence, aggression, or accidents.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/ptsd-help and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: The PTSD Help app offers practical tools specifically for managing discomfort associated with post-traumatic stress.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/ptsd-help and read the section under 'What does PTSD Help do?'.

answers.answer: The PTSD Help app helps users understand their symptoms through a self-assessment module.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/ptsd-help and read the section under 'What does PTSD Help do?'.

answers.answer: The PTSD Help app provides crisis support contacts.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/ptsd-help and read the section under 'What does PTSD Help do?'.

answers.answer: The PTSD Help app details information about available professional treatments.
